DOC.brief_summary: A Prospective , multi-center , single-arm post-approval study IMPELLA® 2.5 System Non Emergent High Risk PCI patient .
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study assess safety efficacy IMPELLA® 2.5 System subject undergo non-emergent high-risk percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) post market approval . The primary endpoint composite clinical endpoint major adverse event 90 day follow PCI procedure . The outcome compare pre specify performance goal 53 % .
